sentences.en: A strong link was found between parental mental illness and disturbance in their children.
sentences.cn: 业已发现父母的精神病史和子女的精神障碍之间有密切的关系。

sentences.en: Any disturbance to the body's state of equilibrium can produce stress.
sentences.cn: 对身体平衡状态的任何干扰都可能产生压力。

sentences.en: army training on controlling civil disturbance
sentences.cn: 控制平民骚乱的军事训练

sentences.en: During the disturbance which followed, three Englishmen were hurt.
sentences.cn: 在接下来的骚乱中，3名英国人受伤。

sentences.en: He is charged with several misdemeanor, including driving without a valid licence and creating a disturbance.
sentences.cn: 他被控告犯有好几种轻罪，其中包括无有效驾驶执照驾驶和扰乱治安。

sentences.en: He is charged with several misdemeanour, including driving without a valid licence and creating a disturbance.
sentences.cn: 他被控告犯有好几种轻罪, 其中包括无有效驾驶执照驾驶和扰乱治安.

sentences.en: He is suffering an emotional disturbance.
He was imprisoned for creating a public disturbance.
sentences.cn: 他因扰乱公共治安而坐牢.

sentences.en: The animals are very sensitive to disturbance and have never bred in captivity.
sentences.cn: 这些动物对外界的干扰很敏感，且从未被圈养过。

sentences.en: The atomization process is more sensitive to disturbance than vaporization.
sentences.cn: 雾化过程比汽化过程对扰动更为敏感.

sentences.en: The building work is creating constant noise, dust and disturbance.
sentences.cn: 建筑施工不断制造噪音、灰尘和干扰。

sentences.en: The home would cause less disturbance to local residents than a school.
sentences.cn: 养老院对当地居民造成的干扰会比学校小。

sentences.en: The patron of the bar was ejected for creating a disturbance.
sentences.cn: 酒吧客人因制造骚乱而被驱离.

sentences.en: The police had been called in to quell a minor disturbance.
sentences.cn: 警察奉命出动以平息一场小规模的骚乱.

sentences.en: There were disturbances in the crowd as fans left the stadium.
sentences.cn: 球迷离开体育场时，人群中发生了骚乱。

sentences.en: There's a violent disturbance in inner city areas.
sentences.cn: 市中心发生了激烈的骚乱.

sentences.en: When a helicopter lands, it can cause a disturbance to local residents.
sentences.cn: 直升机降落会惊扰当地居民。

sentences.en: You can work in here without any disturbance.
sentences.cn: 在这儿你可不受任何干扰地工作.

words.tran_cn: 扰乱的；为心理失常者而设的
打扰；妨碍；使不安；弄乱；使恼怒

phrases.tran_cn: n. 波扰动；[气象学]波状扰动

trans.tran_cn: 骚乱，干扰，（身体或心理）失调
trans.tran_en: a situation in which people behave violently in public
